articles.author: Michael Kelly
articles.title: Gen.G cleanly sweep Cloud9, North America out of Worlds 2021, set up first all-Eastern semifinals since 2017 - Dot Esports
articles.description: The West fell short as a whole in the quarterfinals of Worlds this year.
articles.content: For Cloud9, the burden of being North Americas last hope at Worlds is nothing new. Of the eight League of Legends World Championships that the organization has attended all time, C9 have been the las… [+1732 chars]
